meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 10 meters.
meanings.sent1: The field was measured in dekametres for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The road sign indicated that the distance was 2 dekametres.
meanings.sent3: The dekametres decided to have a race to see who was the longest.
meanings.sent4: His strides were like dekametres, covering ground effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dekametres on the map made it easy to estimate the distance.

meanings.sent1: The construction workers measured the area in dekametres.
meanings.sent2: The signpost showed that the town was just a few dekametres away.
meanings.sent3: The dekametres gathered for a group photo to celebrate their length.
meanings.sent4: The dekametres in the room seemed to stretch endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dekametres of fabric were more than enough to complete the project.
